snippet.title: Party Hard Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
It's 3am. Your neighbors are having a loud party. Stop them. Party Hard! The tactical game of stabbing your loud neighbors is finally out on Steam.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/356570

Developed by Pinokl Games and published by tinyBuild, Party Hard started out as a game jam project. Pinokl Games used to make casual, family friendly games, and their first game jam game was about killing everyone at a party. It became a Youtube hit, and Pinokl partnered up with tinyBuild to make it into a full release.

- 11 semi-procedural levels
- dancing bears
- killer bears
- realistically simulated chickens
- a fully voiced story that takes itself too seriously
- dozens of traps and unique ways to "end" the party
